description: Describes a simple network address translation policy for IP Address and/or Port.
title: Network address translation policy

id.description: Globally unique identifier for translation policy

match_source_ip.description: Optional. If supplied, translate only if sender IP address matches.

match_source_port.description: Optional. If supplied, translate only if sender port matches.

match_destination_ip.description: Optional. If supplied, translate only if destination IP address matches

match_destination_port.description: Optional. If supplied, translate only if sender port matches.

translated_source_ip.description: Optional. If present, translate source to this IP address if all match conditions are true.

translated_source_port.description: Optional. If present, translate source port to this port if all match conditions are true.

translated_destination_ip.description: Optional. If present, translate destination to this IP address if all match conditions are true.

translated_destination_port.description: Optional. If present, translate destination to this port if all match conditions are true.
